subject: Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Although the Scarlet Knights were excited for their first Big Ten game, quarterback Gary Nova threw five interceptions, and the Nittany Lions prevailed with a late score.
snippet: Although the Scarlet Knights were excited for their first Big Ten game, quarterback Gary Nova threw five interceptions, and the Nittany Lions prevailed with a late score.
